text: Au ga waluwalu digaula gi tauwa mo tau magamaga damana mo tau magi huaidu, gei nia henua o henuailala huogodoo ga mmaadagu i di mee dela guu mmada ginai. Nia gowaa huogodoo ala ga hagabagi ginai digaula, gei nia daangada ga homouli huoloo ga mmaadagu huoloo i di mee dela ne hai ang gi digaula, gei ga gadagada gi digaula, ga haga ingoo digaula bolo gu haga halauwa.
